snippet: The choreographer Malini Srinivasan brings sensuality to the dance suite “Tejas Luminous.”
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance suite Tejas Luminous, performed by classical Indian style dancer and choreographer Malini Srinivasan, at Robert Moss Theater as part of New York International Fringe Festival.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Malini Srinivasan brings sensuality to the dance suite “Tejas Luminous.”

headline.main: Dread, Desire and a Lover’s Betrayal, All in the Passage of One Day
headline.print_headline: Dread, Desire and a Lover’s Betrayal, All in the Passage of One Day
